banner.description: Calorin's artificial intelligence-supported assistant and new display technology make calorie calculations easier!

time.title: TIME
time.description: Promote your meal in seconds with the camera.

energy.title: ENERGY
energy.description: Calculate all your nutritional values with one click.

motivation.title: MOTIVATION
motivation.description: Stick to your personal plan and gain momentum.

appDetails.description: All you have to do is take a photo of your meal and Calorin will show you all the nutritional values in seconds.

appLink.description: Follow your progress, stick to the plan and reach your goal thanks to the personal plan offered by Calorin!

vision.title: Vision and Mission
vision.description:
Calorin motivates you for a healthy life by allowing you to track your meals and calories in the most practical way.

Our mission is to make healthy eating simple and accessible to everyone and to instill sustainable healthy living in all our users through the new technology we develop.
